publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To cash ten dollars fr. Wife
To cash fr. goods as pr. Bill
By work of himself & wife from April 1st? to date -

Henry M Paine & Otis Blandin
D debtor
To old chimney. Otis b. ? half
To cash lent as of receipt May 15th
To cash lent as of receipt May 16th
To pay Brown & Chapin & co. for 1 bll. Oil
To frieght(?) of 1 bll. Oil on R.R. 50x (to?)
To cash fr. Bill at Uxbridge
